title: Supabase Auth - Geçerli kimlik bilgileri ile giriş
description: Supabase Auth API ile email/password ile token alınır.

steps.description: Send POST request to {{SUPABASE_URL}}/auth/v1/token?grant_type=password with headers apikey: {{SUPABASE_ANON_KEY}}, Content-Type: application/json and body {"email":"{{LOGIN_EMAIL}}","password":"{{LOGIN_PASSWORD}}"}

title: Supabase Auth - Geçersiz kimlik bilgileri ile giriş reddi
description: Yanlış şifre ile giriş denemesinde 400 hata döner.

steps.description: Send POST request to {{SUPABASE_URL}}/auth/v1/token?grant_type=password with headers apikey: {{SUPABASE_ANON_KEY}}, Content-Type: application/json and body {"email":"wrong@example.com","password":"wrongpass"}

title: Supabase REST - profiles tablosu erişimi
description: Geçerli token ile profiles tablosuna GET isteği başarılı döner.

steps.description: First obtain access_token via POST {{SUPABASE_URL}}/auth/v1/token?grant_type=password with body {"email":"{{LOGIN_EMAIL}}","password":"{{LOGIN_PASSWORD}}"}
Send GET request to {{SUPABASE_URL}}/rest/v1/profiles?select=id,full_name&limit=1 with headers apikey: {{SUPABASE_ANON_KEY}}, Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}
Verify response is valid JSON array
